original_title: Blood Sweat & Tears: Live in Concert
overview: Blood, Sweat & Tears could lay claim to being the first jazz-rock group and were certainly the first to achieve any kind of success.  This DVD, recorded in Canada in 1980 captures BST at their peak and includes their stunning version of the old Motown ballad 'You Made Me So Very Happy'.
title: Blood Sweat & Tears: Live in Concert
